模特表情 | Expressions.微笑: A gentle smile, lips slightly curved upwards, expressing warmth and friendliness.

模特体型|Body type.健美: A well-defined, muscular physique with toned arms, legs, and core, showcasing strength and fitness.
模特体型|Body type.娇小: A petite, smaller frame with shorter height, emphasizing delicacy and compactness.
模特体型|Body type.匀称: A proportionate body type with balanced weight distribution, often with a toned yet natural appearance.
模特体型|Body type.曲线型: An hourglass figure with defined curves, accentuating the waist, hips, and bust.
模特体型|Body type.丰盈: A fuller, voluptuous body type with soft curves and a natural, healthy build.
模特体型|Body type.苗条: A slender body type with a narrow waist and slim limbs, showcasing a graceful silhouette.
模特体型|Body type.肌肉型: A body type with prominent muscle mass and definition, typically associated with fitness models or athletes.
模特体型|Body type.骨感: A very slim frame where bones are more prominent, often giving an edgy, high-fashion look.
模特体型|Body type.宽肩窄腰: A body type with broad shoulders and a narrow waist, often creating a V-shaped silhouette.
模特体型|Body type.梨形: A body type where the hips are wider than the shoulders, creating a feminine, bottom-heavy silhouette.
模特体型|Body type.沙漏型: A curvaceous figure with a well-defined waist and proportionate bust and hips, highlighting classic femininity.
模特体型|Body type.苹果型: A body type where weight is more concentrated in the upper body, especially around the waist and midsection.
模特体型|Body type.运动型: A fit and toned body type with a strong core and lean muscle, typically associated with active lifestyles.
模特体型|Body type.丰满: A body type with generous curves, particularly around the hips, thighs, and bust, often radiating confidence and allure.
模特体型|Body type.紧致型: A toned body type with defined muscles and minimal body fat, creating a fit and polished appearance.
模特体型|Body type.修长: A long, lean body type with elongated limbs, often exuding an elegant and graceful presence.
模特体型|Body type.结实: A sturdy, solid build with muscle definition, reflecting physical strength and resilience.
模特体型|Body type.自然体型: A natural body type that is neither too slim nor too curvy, representing everyday, relatable figures.

模特动作|Action.双手插腰: Standing tall with hands placed confidently on the hips, exuding strength and power.
模特动作|Action.侧身站立: Standing with the body turned slightly to the side, one leg crossed in front of the other for a graceful pose.

模特动作|Action.双臂交叉: Arms crossed over the chest, projecting confidence, assertiveness, or a casual stance.
模特动作|Action.单手举起: One arm raised above the head, fingers spread slightly, giving a dynamic and energetic pose.
模特动作|Action.手放在胸前: Hands gently placed on the chest, creating a soft and tender posture, often used to evoke emotion.
模特动作|Action.手托后脑: One hand resting behind the head, with the elbow bent, giving a relaxed and carefree vibe.
模特动作|Action.双手抱肩: Arms crossed in front of the chest, hands resting on the shoulders, creating a warm, self-embracing pose.
模特动作|Action.背对镜头: Standing with the back facing the camera, head slightly turned to offer a glimpse of the profile.
模特动作|Action.单腿支撑: One leg straight while the other is bent slightly, foot resting on the toes, offering a poised yet relaxed stance.
模特动作|Action.伸展双臂: Arms extended outward or upward, creating a wide, open pose that conveys freedom and energy.
模特动作|Action.双手轻触脸颊: Both hands gently touching the cheeks, creating a soft and delicate expression.
模特动作|Action.单膝跪地: One knee resting on the ground, with the other leg bent, offering a dynamic and engaging pose.
模特动作|Action.倚靠物体: Leaning against a wall or prop, one shoulder touching the surface for a casual, effortless look.
模特动作|Action.抬头望天: Head tilted back, eyes gazing upward, conveying a sense of wonder or contemplation.
模特动作|Action.低头凝视: Head lowered slightly, eyes focused downward, creating a pensive or shy expression.
模特动作|Action.单手叉腰: One hand on the hip, while the other arm is relaxed at the side, adding a confident, asymmetrical pose.
模特动作|Action.侧卧地面: Lying on the side with one arm supporting the head, creating a relaxed, inviting posture.
模特动作|Action.双臂环抱: Arms wrapped around the body, as if giving a hug, conveying warmth, tenderness, or introspection.
模特动作|Action.踮脚尖: Standing on the tips of the toes, creating an elongated, graceful silhouette often used in dance or ballet poses.

构图Composition.面部肖像: A close-up portrait focusing on the face, capturing the model's facial features and expressions with high detail.
构图Composition.半身像: A half-body shot, framing the model from the waist up, highlighting both the face and upper body posture.
构图Composition.全身像: Full-length standing portrait,A full-body shot, capturing the model's entire figure, emphasizing their stance, posture, and full outfit.
构图Composition.广角拍摄: A wide-angle shot, capturing both the model and a significant portion of the surrounding environment, giving a broader context.
构图Composition.特写镜头: An extreme close-up focusing on a specific part of the model, such as the eyes, lips, or hands, to emphasize details.
构图Composition.三分身像: A three-quarter body shot, showing the model from the knees up, providing a fuller view of the outfit while maintaining focus on the upper body.
构图Composition.俯视镜头: A high-angle shot, looking down on the model from above, creating a sense of perspective and highlighting the environment or background.
构图Composition.仰视镜头: A low-angle shot, looking up at the model from below, making the subject appear more imposing or grand.
构图Composition.远景拍摄: A long shot, showing the model at a distance, with the environment playing a significant role in the composition.
构图Composition.近景拍摄: A close-up shot, framing the model's upper body or face, capturing detailed expressions or specific elements of the outfit.
构图Composition.中景拍摄: A medium shot, typically from the waist up, balancing the model and their surroundings in the frame.
构图Composition.超远景拍摄: An extreme long shot, where the model appears small in the frame, surrounded by a vast landscape or large setting.
构图Composition.全景镜头: A panoramic shot, capturing a wide, sweeping view of the scene with the model as part of the expansive background.
构图Composition.肩部特写: A shoulder close-up, framing the model’s face and shoulders, often used for more intimate or personal shots.
构图Composition.腰部镜头: A waist-up shot, focusing on the model’s upper body while also showing details of the waist area and clothing.
构图Composition.群体镜头: A group shot, featuring multiple models or people, balancing each subject within the frame.
构图Composition.动态拍摄: An action shot, capturing the model in motion, such as walking or posing dynamically, to emphasize movement and energy.
构图Composition.静态镜头: A static shot, where the model is posed and still, with the focus on the outfit or overall composition.
构图Composition.侧面镜头: A profile shot, capturing the model from the side, emphasizing the silhouette and facial profile.
构图Composition.背面镜头: A back view shot, focusing on the model from behind, highlighting the back details of the outfit or posture.
构图Composition.单张正面站姿: one image, model standing facing forward,Full-length standing portrait
构图Composition.单张侧面站姿: one image, model standing in profile,Full-length standing portrait
构图Composition.单张背面站姿: one image, model standing facing backward,Full-length standing portrait
构图Composition.单张动态行走: one image, model walking in motion,Full-length standing portrait
构图Composition.单张坐姿: one image, model seated, relaxed posture
构图Composition.双图正侧对比: two images, one facing forward, one in profile
构图Composition.双图前后对比: two images, one facing forward, one facing backward
构图Composition.双图静态与动态: two images, one static standing, one walking
构图Composition.三图前后侧: three images, front, back, and profile views
构图Composition.三图站立与坐姿: three images, standing, seated, and walking
构图Composition.四图正侧后与动态: four images, front, side, back, and one dynamic pose
构图Composition.四图多角度: four images, various angles from front, side, and back
构图Composition.四图不同情境: four images, different poses in varied settings
构图Composition.四图前后侧加细节: four images, front, back, profile, and close-up of details
构图Composition.五图展示细节: five images, front, side, back, dynamic, and garment details
构图Composition.五图平静与运动: five images, calm standing, seated, and dynamic walking or running
构图Composition.六图完整展示: six images, full body from multiple angles and one close-up of fabric
构图Composition.六图故事情节: six images, model interacting with the environment, telling a visual story
构图Composition.多图全方位展示: multiple images, full 360-degree view and various poses
